title: How to Change Your USB Name Without Formatting It

steps.headline: Make a new text file called autorun.inf.
Enter the code.
steps.description:
[autorun]
label=MY NEW USB NAME
Don't forget to change the label to your desired name.

steps.headline: Save the file as autorun.inf in your USB, if you haven't already.
Take out the USB and then put it back in.
steps.description: The name of your USB should be changed.

steps.headline: Hide file autorun.inf.

text:
Make a new text file called autorun.inf. Launch notepad.exe. Enter the code. [autorun] label=MY NEW USB NAME Don't forget to change the label to your desired name. Save the file as autorun.inf in your USB, if you haven't already. Take out the USB and then put it back in. The name of your USB should be changed. Compare: Before{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/51/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-5Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-5Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/51/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-5Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":346,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570.9390444810543,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} After{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f4/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-5Bullet2-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-5Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/f/f4/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-5Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":344,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":569.0821256038647,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Hide file autorun.inf. You can do this by right-clicking on the autorun.inf, and selecting "Properties". Click the "Hidden" checkbox. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/16/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-6Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-6Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/1/16/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-6Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":356,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":587.8041958041958,"licensing":"

License: Creative Commons


"} Don't forget to click "Apply" to save your changes. {"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bf/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-6Bullet2-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-6Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/b/bf/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-6Bullet2-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":386,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":638.124054462935,"licensing":"

sentences: Make a new text file called autorun.inf.

[autorun]
label=MY NEW USB NAME
Don't forget to change the label to your desired name.
Save the file as autorun.inf in your USB, if you haven't already.
Take out the USB and then put it back in.
The name of your USB should be changed.

Compare: Before{"smallUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/51/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-5Bullet1-Version-2.jpg/v4-460px-Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-5Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","bigUrl":"https://www.wikihow.com/images/5/51/Change-Your-USB-Name-Without-Formatting-It-Step-5Bullet1-Version-2.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":346,"bigWidth":760,"bigHeight":570.9390444810543,"licensing":"

"} Hide file autorun.inf.
You can do this by right-clicking on the autorun.inf, and selecting "Properties".
